entry.title: Ubuntu
entry.content:
sudo apt install qrencode zbar-tools medusa hydra hydra-gtk john netcat-traditional bkhive samdump2 wifite nmap netdiscover chntpw git rdesktop gparted

#nc -e option
rm /etc/alternatives/nc && ln -s /bin/nc.traditional /etc/alternatives/nc

#移除
apt purge -y thunderbird  gnome-keyring empathy aisleriot  landscape-client-ui-install brasero

entry.title: Backup
entry.content:
sudo rsync -a / /bk/bk_$(date +"%m%d%Y") --exclude=/bk --exclude=/media/* --exclude=/sys/* --exclude=/proc/* --exclude=/mnt/* --exclude=/tmp/* sudo rsync -a bk_04142020 /

run/user/1000/gvfs" failed: Permission denied

ref https://blog.csdn.net/codemacket/article/details/77864770 sudo umount /run/user/1000/gvfs rm -rf /run/user/1000/gvfs

entry.title: Wsl
entry.content:
#powershell run
Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux

# ms-windows-store://search/?query=WSL


# x11
apt-get install x11-apps
echo "export DISPLAY=127.0.0.1:0" >> ~/.bashrc

# terminal
https://goreliu.github.io/wsl-terminal/
